text: Tara te loka tyanna khote tharavita rahile, maga amhi tyanna, ani je tyancyasobata nauketa svara hote, tya sarvanna sutaka pradana keli ani tyanna varasa banavile ani jyanni amacya ayatinna khote tharavile hote tyanna budavuna takale, tevha vicara kelya pahije ki kasa sevata jhala tya lokanca, jyanna pahilyapasuna bhaya dakhavile gele hote
